title: Virtual Assistant - Lead Generation
job_overview:
Virtual Assistant (Part-Time, Remote) — Outreach & Scheduling Support

I’m an entrepreneur selling a mindfulness program to schools, working directly with school leaders to bring awareness and compassion practices into education.

I’m looking for an organized, proactive virtual assistant to help with light outreach and scheduling — only about 1–2 hours per day.

What you’ll do:
- Use my CRM and provided resources to help with email and LinkedIn outreach to school leaders and referrers (mostly in Texas and across the USA)
- Schedule intro calls with school administrators and leadership teams
- Keep track of responses, update contact records, and follow up as needed
- Support with light admin tasks related to outreach (e.g., updating templates, basic research)

Who you are:
- Detail-oriented and organized
- Comfortable with email and online tools (experience with CRMs a plus)
- Friendly, professional communication style
- Self-motivated and reliable — able to take initiative with minimal oversight

Time commitment:
- Approximately 1–2 hours per day, flexible hours

If you're interested in supporting mindfulness in education and want a low-hour, impactful remote role, I’d love to hear from you! -Bob
